name: failblog.org & cheezburger.com sites ad free
description:
failblog.org & cheezburger.com sites (most of them ) ad free
Removed the social links ( .socmarks, #sendtofriend ).
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document 
  domain("failblog.org"),
  domain("cheezburger.com"),
  domain("icanhascheezburger.com"),
  domain("ihasahotdog.com"),
  domain("roflrazzi.com"),
  domain("totallylookslike.com"),
  domain("punditkitchen.com"),
  domain("graphjam.com"),
  domain("thereifixedit.com"),
  domain("upnextinsports.com"),
  domain("failbook.com"),
  domain("engrishfunny.com"),
  domain("friendsofirony.com"),
  domain("verydemotivational.com"),
  domain("somuchpun.com"),
  domain("mthruf.com"),
  domain("poorlydressed.com"),
  domain("ridiculousposes.com"),
  domain("ifshoescouldkill.com"),
  domain("thisisphotobomb.com"),
  domain("pictureisunrelated.com"),
  domain("comixed.com"),
  domain("ugliesttattoos.com"),
  domain("hackedirl.com"),
  domain("oddlyspecific.com"),
  domain("chatroulettetrolling.com"),
  domain("senorgif.com"),
  domain("overkill9000.com")
{
   #leaderboard,
   #floattop,
   #ctl00_ctl00_floattop,
   #rightskyad,
   #toprightad,
   #blogads,
   #headerlogo,
   #btf160,
   .skyscraper,
   #header,
   #footer,
   #subfooter,
   #footerad,
   #sendtofriend,
   #leftcolumnad,
   #footer728Ad,
   .commentnow + div,
   .socmarks
       { display:none; }
   
   .masterPageMainbody { margin-top:0px !important; }

   .globalNavTop { margin-top:0px !important; }

   #panemain { padding-top:0px !important; }
   #pane3 { width:300px !important; }
}
